Call for Sponsors 

		Posted on
		

					April 11, 2023				

					April 22, 2023				



		by
		

				Mukalele Rogers			





Are you looking for a way to support the WordPress community and showcase your brand, product, or service to a diverse and enthusiastic audience? Do you want to be part of a unique and impactful event that promotes learning, innovation, and collaboration with WordPress? Do you want to connect with potential customers, partners, and talent in the Jinja area and beyond?
If you answered yes to any of these questions, then we invite you to become a sponsor of WordCamp Jinja 2023!
WordCamp Jinja 2023 is a two-day event that will take place on Monday 4th – Tuesday 5th September 2023 at Iganga Secondary School. Our theme for this year is: ‘There is always more to learn!‘
We expect to attract over 300 attendees, including students, teachers, developers, designers, bloggers, entrepreneurs, and WordPress enthusiasts from Jinja and surrounding areas. We also have an extra Contributor Day on Wednesday 6th September 2023 at The Innovation Village Jinja, where we will engage with the local WordPress community and contribute to the WordPress project.
WordCamp Jinja 2023 is organized by volunteers from the Jinja WordPress Meetup group, with the support of the WordPress Foundation. WordCamp Jinja 2023 is a non-profit event that relies on the generosity of sponsors like you to make it happen.
Sponsor Benefits
As a sponsor of WordCamp Jinja 2023, you will get:

A sponsor booth at the event venue, where you can display your logo, banner, flyers, stickers, and other promotional materials
A sponsor page on our website, where you can showcase your brand, product, or service with a logo, description, link, and social media handles
A sponsor mention on our social media channels, newsletter, and blog posts
A sponsor shout-out during the opening and closing remarks of the event
A sponsor badge and a swag bag
A chance to network with other sponsors, speakers, organizers, volunteers, and attendees
A chance to reach a large and diverse audience of WordPress users and enthusiasts
A chance to support the WordPress community and project in Jinja and beyond

Sponsor Levels
We have different levels of sponsorship available for WordCamp Jinja 2023:

Platinum: $2,000 USD
Gold: $1,000 USD
Silver: $500 USD
Bronze: $300 USD
Micro sponsorship: $50 USD (Get Microsponsor Ticket here)

We also welcome in-kind sponsorship for provision of workshop items / services like swag, videography, photography, publicity etc.
Each level of sponsorship comes with different benefits and opportunities. You can find more details about each level in this sponsorship packages document.
Wordcamp-Jinja-2023-Sponsorship-Packages-1Download
NB: Microsponsor tickets can simply be purchased online at jinja.wordcamp.org/2023/buy-ticket/
Sponsor Application
If you are interested in becoming a sponsor of WordCamp Jinja 2023, please fill out this sponsor application form below by Friday 27th July 2023.
If you have any questions or concerns about sponsoring WordCamp Jinja 2023, please contact us at jinja@wordcamp.org.
We look forward to hearing from you!





Contact Name(required)



Company Name(required)



Company Website



Email(required)



Phone Number



Sponsorship Level(required)

Select one option
Platinum – $2,000
Gold – $1,000
Silver – $500
Bronze – $300
Microsponsor – $50
In Kind Sponsorship



Why Would you Like to Sponsor WordCamp? What are your expectations and In-Kind Contributions if any?(required)



Any Other Questions / Comments?
